core_memory.user_hobbies_sailing_club_additional: Sailing provides a sense of freedom and problem-solving thrill. Started with dad at a local marina on tiny sailboats; now join a student-rate club during breaks. The unpredictability of wind and water mirrors coding challenges, offering a mental reset from deadlines and project stress.
core_memory.user_academic_info: Fourth-year CS major taking advanced courses: complex algorithms, system design, quantum computing basics. Busy schedule, crunch time.
core_memory.user_hobbies_balance: Hobbies keep me sane and help me come back to programming with a fresh perspective. I need breaks to avoid being stuck behind my laptop 24/7.

archival_memory.user_academic_load: Fourth-year CS major taking advanced courses: complex algorithms, system design, quantum computing basics. Busy schedule, crunch time.
